Logo::

OOC: I know, I know, I misread the post. I'm sorry. I'll repost it.

Cam::

She emerged from the CR chamber and looked about. With no other bots 
around, she decided to have some fun and explore the base.  She 
followed her little fox nose around to the kitchens, past the 
engineering hangers, through the private quarters and to the main 
entrance.  She looked around and inhaled the fresh outside air. She 
looked out and saw some white butterflies dancing on the breeze.  She 
ran after them in an attemp to play with them.  She jumped around and 
leaped at them. But the butterflies were always just out of 
reach. "Hey, how can we play tag if I can't tag you?" she giggled.  
She stopped a few hundred yards from the base and got a drink of 
water from a small stream.  She sighed and sat down. She yawned and 
layed down.  She looked up and watched the soft fluffy white clouds 
pass by.  She saw different shapes in the clouds and started to name 
them. "Bunny, transport pod, small lunar module, fish, a flower, "  
she stopped and sighed. "Mom, I hope your listening. I am trying to 
be good here. And Dad, I still don't like eating meat. It tastes 
funny. Can I please stick with just the sweet energon?"  She sighed 
and looked down. She rested her head on her paws and whispered. "Mom, 
Dad, wish you were here."
